title: Nick Thomas-Symonds – 2021 Statement on 150,000 Arrest Records Deleted by Home Office
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Nick Thomas-Symonds, the Shadow Home Secretary, on 15 January 2021.
content:
This is an extraordinarily serious security breach that presents huge dangers for public safety.
